results.title: Accelerated bio-cognitive aging in Down syndrome: State of the art and possible deceleration strategies
results.text_hl: In the same vein, and considering its safety profile, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could be a promising candidate for possible clinical trials also on @<m>DISEASE_Down_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004314 @@@DS@@@ persons.

citations.NLM: Franceschi C, Garagnani P, Gensous N, Bacalini MG, Conte M, Salvioli S. Accelerated bio-cognitive aging in Down syndrome: State of the art and possible deceleration strategies Aging Cell. 2019 Jun;18(3):e12903. PMID: 30768754

results.title: Metformin restores the mitochondrial network and reverses mitochondrial dysfunction in Down syndrome cells.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ restores the mitochondrial network and reverses @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial dysfunction@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Down_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004314 @@@Down syndrome@@@ cells.

results.title: Pioglitazone Improves Mitochondrial Organization and Bioenergetics in Down Syndrome Cells
results.text_hl: We have recently evaluated a @GENE_PPARGC1A @GENE_10891 @@@PGC-1alpha@@@ activator, the @CHEMICAL_Biguanides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001645 @@@biguanide@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, in a @<m>DISEASE_Down_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004314 @@@DS@@@ cell model.
